solution_line_template: First find the total number of legos on the bottom layer: {bottom_legos_per_side} legos * {bottom_legos_per_side} legos = <<{bottom_legos_per_side}*{bottom_legos_per_side}={bottom_legos}>>{bottom_legos} legos
